thread.section_title: Vacuum-Direct.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vacuum-Direct.com | vacuum-direct.com
thread.title: john reading

author: john reading
title: john reading
text: Ordered a part (retainer for beater bar), price was very low, service was 2 business days to north Florida. Part fit perfectly and I did not expect it but it made my vacuum much quieter. As the old part was getting worn down, it was allowing the beater bar to rattle and etc. Great outfit, be happy to do business with them. My wife is mad because I fixed a good vacuum and kept her from buying a new one. That is an extra benefit that married guys will appreciate.
